mapper.select: select i.*, pe.*, o.*, w.*, pr.* from INBOUND i join PERFORMANCE pe on i.per_cd = pe.per_cd join ORDERS o on i.ord_cd = o.ord_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = o.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd
select count(i.ib_cd) from INBOUND i join PERFORMANCE pe on i.per_cd = pe.per_cd join ORDERS o on i.ord_cd = o.ord_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = o.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd
select o.*, c.*, pr.*, w.* from OUTBOUND o join CONTRACT c on o.con_cd = c.con_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = c.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd
select count(o.ob_cd) from OUTBOUND o join CONTRACT c on o.con_cd = c.con_cd join PRODUCT pr on pr.pro_cd = c.pro_cd join WAREHOUSE w on w.wh_cd = pr.wh_cd
